languages.text:
Grants an additional {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} that affects all adjacent cells around the wielder.
<indent=5%>+1 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} per character in the party</indent>

<indent=5%>+1 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} за каждого персонажа в отряде</indent>
